main.name: Jose Figueroa
main.occupation: Chemical Engineering by day, computer nerd by night
main.description: Working in the natural gas and pipeline integrity industry. Always looking to use my computer skills to make new tools or interfaces for work
main.bio: My name is Jose, I'm a Chemical engineer that has always had a big interest for programming. Currently I am working at the Southern California Gas Company and would love to start freelancing or getting a second job using my programmings skills
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to learn together. I am always happy to teach and learn working on new projects together.

resume.skillmessage: Here below a variety of my programming skills

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Chemical Engineering
education.description: Chemistry focus. SHPE leader for 4 years, AIChE App Competition winner 2015

work.title: US-LATAM Technical Liaison
work.description: Lead and collaborated in R&D, Quality and Manufacturing projects in relation to our regions in the US and in Latin America

work.title: Analytical Chemist
work.description: Operated multiple analytical equipment. Perfromed multiple R&D projects.

work.title: Mobile App Development Supervisor
work.description: Lead a java based android application in relation to our solving multivariable thermodynamic problems. Won the AIChE App Competition in 2015.

projects.title: AIChE App Competition winner
projects.category: Work on a thermodynamic calculator to propose results for multi variable thermodynamic problems. (Java, database, Android Studio)

projects.title: My personal website
projects.category: Work on a personal website using a blog format (HTML and CSS)

testimonials.text: A highly skilled engineer with incredibly work ethic. You would be crazy to pass up on him.
